nodes.text: Conference Room 2-Aurek was a meeting room located on the main level of the Senate Building, on the Galactic Republic capital planet of Coruscant. In 3643 BBY, during the Cold War with the Sith Empire, the Mon Calamari general Var Suthra held a meeting there with the Republic scientist Doctor Eli Tarnis, Jedi Masters Orgus Din and Bela Kiwiiks, Padawan Kira Carsen, and Din's former student to discuss the missing files for the Planet Prison superweapon.

Conference Room 2-Aurek is a class-restricted story phase in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, accessible by Jedi Knight players in the Coruscant mission
"The Jedi Envoy". It was also mentioned as a Jedi Knight phase in the Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide, released by Prima Games on December 20, 2011.
